kDesc
Red and black knee-length swim trunks. Perfect for lounging by the seaside. [#Legal]
Un bermuda de bain rouge et noir arrivant au-dessus du genou. Idéal pour se prélasser au bord de l'eau. [#Legal]
Schwarz-rote knielange Badehose. Ideal zum Entspannen am Strand. [#Legal]
Pantaloncini da bagno rossi e neri. Perfetti per rilassarsi sulla spiaggia. [#Legal]
Unas bermudas rojas y negras. Perfectas para relajarse junto al mar. [#Legal]
赤と黒の膝丈の水着。海辺のレジャーにぴったり。[#Legal]
빨간색과 검은색이 섞인 무릎 길이의 수영복. 해변의 레저 활동에 딱. [#Legal]
Red and black knee-length swim trunks. Perfect for lounging by the seaside. [#Legal]
紅、黑色的泳褲，長度及膝。最適合在海邊進行休閒活動。[#Legal]
